title: One-page business website for WordPress Capital

requirements.text: Create a responsive one-page marketing website for the business name "WordPress Capital" with clear sectioning and smooth in-page navigation.

quotes: I want to cerate a one page website for my business, Imy business name is WordPress Capital

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders as a single page with multiple sections (no required multi-page routing).
Top navigation includes anchor links that scroll to sections on the same page.
Layout is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

requirements.text: Add a Services section that lists and groups the provided offerings exactly: WordPress Development (including Theme creation/customisation and Plugin development), WooCommerce Development, Shopify Development, ReactJS / Vue JS, and Hosting solutions.

quotes:
i provided services like 
WordPress Development 
- Theme creation/customisation
- Plugin development
WooCommerce Development
Shopify Development
ReactJS / Vue JS 
Hosting solutions

acceptanceCriteria: Services are displayed with clear headings and short supporting bullet points for the two WordPress Development sub-items.
All services provided by the user appear on the page with correct spelling/capitalization as provided (including "ReactJS / Vue JS" and "Hosting solutions").
Services section is visually scannable (e.g., cards or columns) and remains usable on small screens.

requirements.text: Include a Hero section featuring the business name "WordPress Capital" and a concise tagline describing web development and e-commerce solutions (in English).
acceptanceCriteria: Tagline is in English and aligns with the listed services (WordPress/WooCommerce/Shopify/React/Vue/Hosting).
Hero includes at least one clear call-to-action button that scrolls to the Services section.

requirements.text: Apply a creative, coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) consistently across the one-page site.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent design system is evident across sections (buttons, headings, cards, spacing).
Theme avoids default/unstyled template appearance and does not rely on blue/purple as the primary palette.

requirements.text: Add the generated image assets to the frontend as static files under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and render them in the page (logo and hero visual).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and are referenced directly by the frontend (not served via backend).
Logo image is displayed in the header/navigation area.
Hero image/illustration is displayed in the hero section without layout shift or distortion.

constraints: Do not require or depend on any external database or third-party services for core site functionality.
Do not modify any files under the immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose those components/hooks as-is if needed.
nonGoals: Implementing a CMS, blog, or multi-page site.
Implementing third-party authentication (only Internet Identity is supported, and it is not required for this one-page site).
Implementing email delivery or integrations (e.g., SendGrid/Mailgun/SMTP) for contact forms.

required: Minimal modern logo mark with the text "WordPress Capital" (wp-capital-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Abstract web development hero illustration (laptop/browser/code/e-commerce motif) (wp-capital-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)
